title: Predict: Model Complexity and Performance
story: Model complexity affects performance. Too simple = underfitting (poor train and test). Too complex = overfitting (great train, poor test).
instructions: Predict the output. Which complexity scenario shows underfitting? Print the scenario number (1 or 2). Scenario 1: train=0.95, test=0.92. Scenario 2: train=0.6, test=0.58.
starterCode:
# Scenario 1: train=0.95, test=0.92
# Scenario 2: train=0.6, test=0.58

# Underfitting = both scores low
# Scenario 2 shows underfitting
print(2)

tests.expectedBehavior: Identify underfitting from low train and test scores

hints.text: Underfitting: both train and test scores are low. Model is too simple.
Scenario 1: good fit (both high). Scenario 2: underfitting (both low).
